title: Manutius
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921152345/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices): [Tools](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921152345/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tools): [Type Design Tools](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921152345/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type%20Design%20Tools) : Manutius**

free [Type1](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921152345/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type1) editor for Windows 3.1 and higher

German version: [http://www.typeforum.de/news\_126.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921152345/http:/www.typeforum.de/news_126.htm "http://www.typeforum.de/news\_126.htm") -- [Download](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921152345/http:/www.typeforum.de/modules.php?op=modload&name=Downloads&file=index&req=getit&lid=50)  
English version: [http://mywebpage.netscape.com/yeahnoah/manutius.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921152345/http:/mywebpage.netscape.com/yeahnoah/manutius.htm "http://mywebpage.netscape.com/yeahnoah/manutius.htm")
author: andreas
